title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the image is not refreshing and the original image remains displayed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and the newly imported image should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout. 2. See that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
